concept.title: Payments Overview
concept.shortdesc: Over two million businesses use Square payments to get paid. With Square Payments, business owners and freelancers alike can accept all their customer payments quickly and securely.

div.p: Square Business users can easily accept credit or debit card payments on the go or in their store.

ul.li: Print or send digital receipts to their customers
Get access to company funds almost right away with a Square Card

div.p: Business owners and freelancers can create, send, and track their invoices. Proffessionally designed invoices and estimates gives customers and easier, and secure way to pay.

Square offers:
Customizable invoicing software
Automated Reminders
Transparent Tracking
Recurring invoice setup
And more!
When customers are not there in person, business owners can take remote credit card payments over the phone or from the computer.
Square users can create an online store, and connect payments through Square.

section.title: Offline Mode
section.p: In Offline Mode Square, business owners and freelancers will never miss a customer sale no matter the issue. If your internet service is down or temporarily unavailable, customer card payments can still be swiped. As soon as your device regains internet connectivity, all payments are processed.

section.title: Analytics
section.p: Square users have access to the Square Dashboard at https://squareup.com/us/en. Business owners and freelancers can view their sale history, transfers, and best selling products and services. Square Analytics also gives Square user customer insights, charts, and more.

div.p: Square business owners have the option to process funds for payments directly from the square app or through the online Square dashboard. Refunds that are processed through Square on the phone or tablet must be requested and completed within 120 days of the original transaction. Payments processed through the Square dashboard can be refunded within one year of the original purchase. Customers are refunded the full purchase anount and business owners will be refunded the Square proccessing fee.
